nodes.text: The mantle of the supreme representative was a Neimoidian senatorial mantle worn by Neimoidian Senator Lott Dod while he served in the Senate of the Galactic Republic. The mantle consisted of a purple strip of cloth with small swirl patterning worn over the shoulders and around the neck, with a diamond shaped emblem below the shoulder on each side. Rune Haako wore the mantle while at the Petranaki Arena on the planet Geonosis.

The mantle of the supreme representative first appeared in the 1999 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. It was first identified in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
